about_the_game:
Panzer War is an action-packed tank warfare game that puts you in control of a vast array of historically accurate armored vehicles from World War I to the Cold War era. With over 200 tanks, self-propelled guns, and armored vehicles at your command, experience the intensity of armored combat across a variety of battlefields and game modes.

Damage System



We feature a modular damage system that simulates shrapnel damage to vehicle components and crew members, affecting your tank's performance. For players seeking a more straightforward experience, we also offer an HP mode, where the damage mechanics are simplified, making the game more accessible.

Diverse Game Modes


Offline Game Modes
  • Skirmish: Engage in fast-paced battles where you can pit your tanks against AI in an open-ended combat environment.
  • N vs N Blitzkrieg: Experience the thrill of large-scale team battles where coordination and strategy are key to victory.
  • Capture Zone: Control strategic points on the map to gain the upper hand in battle.
  • Historical Mode: Relive iconic tank battles with historically accurate scenarios.
  • Tank and Map Designer: Unleash your creativity by designing custom tanks and battle maps for offline play.

Online Multiplayer:
  • Skirmish: Test your skills against other players in competitive, fast-paced battles.
  • Capture Zone: Work with your team to secure control points in intense multiplayer matches.
  • Party Mode: Enjoy fun and chaotic matches with friends in a variety of custom game modes.

Instant Vehicle Access

There’s no need to grind through tech trees or farm in-game currency. All vehicles are available for immediate use, allowing you to jump straight into battle with any tank, self-propelled gun, or armored vehicle you desire. This freedom ensures that you can focus on enjoying the intense combat experience without any unnecessary progression barriers.

Mod Support


We offers robust mod support through its in-game installer, allowing players to easily browse, download, and install community-created content. Whether you're looking for new vehicles, or maps, the in-game mod installer makes it simple to expand and customize your Panzer War experience.

Next-Generation Graphics (Test Version)


Step into the future of tank warfare with the HDRP version of Panzer War, offering next-generation graphics that push the boundaries of realism. With advanced lighting, lifelike shadows, and high-quality textures, the HDRP version delivers an unparalleled visual experience. Please note that this is still a test version under development, and we are continuously working to optimize and enhance the graphical performance. Your feedback is valuable as we strive to perfect this cutting-edge experience.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
